forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 5pm. Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, an enveloping blanket of marine fog hangs lazily over the horizon, softening the outlines of iconic landmarks while leaving a light sheen of moisture in the air. The current visibility might appear hazy, yet a gentle light breaks through, suggesting that the sun is asserting its presence behind the clouds. As the day unfolds, a chance of drizzle lingers, hinting at the possibility of a brief shower, but it’s the cool, crisp air that will prevail. The forecast offers a high near 65, but the essence of this coastal city is markedly maritime, with breezes lacing through the streets.

As you prepare to venture out, dressing in layers could be your best option; a cozy sweater paired with a breathable jacket will balance the chill with the hint of warmth that could emerge in the afternoon. Today is an ideal canvas for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the charming cafés tucked away in the nooks, where you can sip a warming beverage while keeping an eye on the ever-changing dance of the clouds. Though the sun may play coy, the spirit of curiosity and exploration beckons from every corner of the city, making even the simplest of moments a pleasure in this vibrant, coastal enclave.
